virality_potential.justification: Expresses a common pain point in crypto communities with strong emotional language, likely to resonate within niche groups.

informative_value.justification: No factual content beyond expressing frustration about gas fees.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Strong negative sentiment conveyed through complaint and vomiting emoji.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant only until gas fee fluctuations change, tied to transient market conditions.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral tone focused on gathering opinions.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevance limited to poll duration and immediate responses.

duration_of_impact.justification: Discusses fundamental adoption factors with weeks-long relevance.
